RA0001.description: We know some people need support to access information and use our services. We often call this a reasonable adjustment. Some reasonable adjustments need to be agreed by the judge or HMCTS. You can discuss with the court if your needs change.
RA0001.full_question: Do you have a physical, mental or learning disability or health condition that means you need support during your case?

RA0002.hint: For example, braille or different colours and text sizes
RA0002.description: Think about all communications with the court, as well as what you might need at a hearing. Consider remote and in-person hearings, in case your preferred hearing type is not possible.

error.empty: Select whether you need documents in an alternate format
